title: I funerali di Enrico Berlinguer 1984).avi

The farewell to Enrico Berlinguer is a collective documentary shot in 1984 during the funeral of the leader of the PCI.
The film is a collection of images mainly public and the revival of his political character. This film recounts briefly the political life of Enrico Berlinguer. Reviewing pictures of 1976, at the Congress of the CPSU in Moscow, and in 1984, in Padua, from the stage of Piazza della Frutta, during the closing rally of the European elections, with Berlinguer visibly suffering.
I got the .avi from Http://www.rebeldemule.org/foro/monograf/tema972.html
